page.title: 13Williton Library
page.content: The{library}was a shed then a tailors shop now it is the library.The{daily } jobs depends on how busy it is. The {main jobs}are to tidy books and put them back on the shelves,and check that there are no 'overdues',change the date-stamp and the stock of books The{most popular books}are light Romances by Mills and Boon.The stock of{ordinary books}is changed every three months and the{large print}every two months or as often as they can.Not many young people use the library but alot of old grans do,but the older men stay in the car and let their wives choose for them.The librarian worked in London for 5 years and in Williton library for 11 years.Many{foreigners } come to the library for{infomation {about the area.}The librarian does not work a full week. She works some Saturdays at other places.
